divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside walking my dog when my friend pointed out some weird lights in the sky. There were two sets of lights in a boomerang shape. The were very high in the sky and flying in circles around each other. They would fade in and out like the lights were only on one side of the crafts. We ran inside and when we came out it looked like 3 planes were flying around the area where we had seen the lights.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Broomfield
There were no other sightings in Broomfield on or around November 3rd 2008
